Some message that I have here to show formatting.  These two newline characters mark the end of a paragraph.

So this is a new paragraph.

And this is a third paragraph!
Due to the observance of Good Friday and resulting limited liquidity in the financial markets, term credit will not be available today. The deadline to request overnight credit remains 2:00 p.m.
